title: Music Lab Survey (5 min to complete)
description: We value your input! Help us make Music Lab even better through this quick survey. It should only take you about 5 minutes to complete.

elements.name: jam_session_yes_no
elements.title: Did your class do the "Music Lab: Jam Session" tutorial?

pages.name: for_teachers
pages.title: Your classroom's experience
pages.description: Tell us about your and your students' experience with "Music Lab: Jam Session"

elements.name: question3
elements.title: How many total students did the "Music Lab: Jam Session" tutorial with you?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Did you show the intro video at the front of the class?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Overall, how satisfied are you with the "Music Lab: Jam Session" tutorial? (5 = Very satisfied, 1 = Very dissatisfied)

elements.name: question4
elements.title: In general, how interested are your students in pursuing careers in technology?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: How did the tutorial affect your studentsâ€™ interests in pursuing careers in technology?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? "The majority of my students feel like they belong in careers in technology."

elements.name: question8
elements.title: What do you like the most about Music Lab?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What is the most difficult part(s) about Music Lab? How could we make it easier to use?

pages.name: page3
pages.title: Bonus questions for students (optional)
pages.description: How do you feel about careers in technology? Your answers will help us understand how this tutorial helps students like you learn about future possibilities!

elements.name: question9
elements.title: How interested are you in pursuing a career in technology?

elements.name: question11
elements.title: How did this tutorial affect your interest in pursuing a career in technology?

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? "I feel like I belong in a career in technology."
